abstract.text: This property is part of quick create. It specifies the credentials required for the integration, if any. For a Lambda integration, three options are available. To specify an IAM Role for API Gateway to assume, use the role’s Amazon Resource Name (ARN). To require that the caller’s identity be passed through from the request, specify arn:aws:iam::

. To use resource-based permissions on supported AWS services, don’t specify this parameter. Currently, this property is not used for HTTP integrations. If provided, this value replaces the credentials associated with the quick create integration. Supported only for HTTP APIs.

This property is part of quick create. It specifies the credentials required for the integration, if any. For a Lambda integration, three options are available. To specify an IAM Role for API Gateway to assume, use the role’s Amazon Resource Name (ARN). To require that the caller’s identity be passed through from the request, specify arn:aws:iam::

. To use resource-based permissions on supported AWS services, don’t specify this parameter. Currently, this property is not used for HTTP integrations. If provided, this value replaces the credentials associated with the quick create integration. Supported only for HTTP APIs.
